page.title: 14Carnival Time Pontarddulais
page.content:
{Pontarddulais}and{Hendy Carnival 1985 by Suzanne Robinson, aged 11.
The carnival was soon so Jennifer and I decided to dress as Litterbugs. We worked at our costumes and they were ready for the Saturday. It was 12.45. Jennifer came to my house. We changed and travelled down to{Hendy Square}by car. Judges wandered around deciding on winners in each category. By 2.00 we had been judged and started walking down{St.Teilo Street.}We had pink, orange and purple hair with black sacks covered with all kinds of litter. Everybody laughed at us and somebody even thought we were hedgehogs. We thoroughly enjoyed ourselves even though we did not win. At least we had tried. Now for next year.
